head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths WORCESTER, DEAN KIRKHAM, JR.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths WORCESTER, DEAN KIRKHAM, JR.

block.p: WORCESTER-Dean Kirkham, Jr. Of New York City, July 15, 2000, age 77. Loving father of Charles L. of Medford, MA, Edward D. of Seattle, WA, and Amanda W. Swinchoski of Watertown, MA. Grandfather of James and Louisa Swinchoski. Also survived by sisters, Shirley Braun of New York City and Sue Light of Suffield, CT. Former husband of Barbara Pennypacker Worcester, NY. Graduated from Brooks School, North Andover, MA, 1940. Served in the United States Army Signal Corps 1942-1945. Received BA, Yale, 1947; Ph.D., Peterhouse, Cambridge, England, 1951; awarded Fulbright Grant. Worked for Doubleday & Co. and Bankers Trust Co. Member of Canterbury Choral Society and Blue Hill Troupe. Memorial service will be held at a later date. Memorial donations may be made to: New York Public Library, 5th Ave. and 40th St., NY, NY 10018. For further information contact J.S. Waterman & Sons EastmanWaring, 495 Commonwealth Ave., Boston, MA 02215. (617) 536-4110.
